Description.Name: Million C-Bill Loan
Description.Details: This note certifies the temporary transfer to the bearer of 1,000,000 c-bills from Discount Dan's Savings and Loan LLC. Bearer is responsible for repayment of the full amount plus applicable fees and interest within 60 days. Interest on this loan is 10% of the loan value, deducted from the bearer's account monthly. A further 10% fee is deducted upon repayment.
